meanings.definition: To cover lightly with something scattered or sprinkled
meanings.sent1: The snow besprinkles the ground, turning it into a winter wonderland.
meanings.sent2: The baker besprinkles powdered sugar on the freshly baked cake.
meanings.sent3: The clown besprinkles confetti on the audience, bringing smiles to their faces.
meanings.sent4: The starry sky besprinkles the night with twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The artist besprinkles glitter on the painting, making it sparkle.
